BaseTemplate.description: BrainCo Official Website - Leader in Brain-Computer Interface Technology

Index.meta_title: BrainCo - Leader in Brain-Computer Interface Technology
Index.meta_description: BrainCo focuses on brain-computer interface technology, offering innovative products like intelligent bionic hands and Revolimb bionic legs

Home.bci_section_desc_1: As China's first unicorn in the brain-computer interface field, BrainCo is dedicated to breakthroughs in core BCI technology. By establishing signal transmission pathways between the brain and external devices to achieve information exchange, we provide solutions for disabled rehabilitation and brain disorders such as autism. Multiple products are now on the market.
Home.bci_section_desc_2: In the future, BrainCo will continue to focus on non-invasive brain-computer interface technology, providing solutions for depression, Alzheimer's disease, and other conditions.
Home.product_oxyzen_desc: An intelligent system for meditation and sleep
Home.product_brain_robotics_desc: Smart prosthetic hand integrating BCI technology and AI algorithms
Home.product_brain_ai_desc: Industrial-grade prosthetic hand kit for STEM education
Home.product_mobius_desc: An advanced intelligent prosthetic knee joint with control algorithms derived from BCI research, providing precise motion experience
Home.product_dexterous_desc:
Award-winning, ergonomic,
highly adaptable with smooth operation

About.meta_description: BrainCo was founded in 2015 as the first Chinese team selected by Harvard Innovation Lab, committed to becoming a global leader in non-invasive brain-computer interface technology solutions
About.intro_text: Founded in 2015, BrainCo is the first Chinese team selected by Harvard Innovation Lab. We are committed to becoming a global leader in non-invasive brain-computer interface technology solutions, with leading advantages in rehabilitation, health, and human-computer interaction.
About.mission_text: Brain-Computer Interface Technology, Unlocking Life's Infinite Possibilities
About.vision_text: Create the best brain-computer interface products and become a global technology leader
About.contribution_text: With a shared commitment to helping people with disabilities, BrainCo has been actively partnering with local disabled persons' federations and foundations to provide bionic hands free of charge to eligible individuals. We also actively participate in the "Impoverished Disabled Children Relief Project" by the Life Foundation, providing assistance to impoverished disabled children in need. Additionally, we have established the "Forearm Loss Public Welfare Project" in partnership with hospitals. As of 2022, this project has successfully launched at Guangdong Provincial People's Hospital and the Third Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University, enabling nationwide coverage for eligible forearm loss applicants and providing them with BrainCo intelligent bionic hands with free installation. In 2023, the Zhejiang Provincial Development and Reform Commission, in collaboration with the Zhejiang Provincial Disabled Persons' Federation, initiated a public welfare project to assist people with limb disabilities through technology. This pioneering project in China provides free intelligent prosthetics to people with limb disabilities, helping them regain their ability to walk and improve their quality of life. The project is expected to provide 1,000 people with limb loss in Zhejiang Province with free BrainCo Revolimb intelligent bionic legs.

Contact.meta_description: Contact BrainCo to learn about our solutions in rehabilitation, health, education, and embodied intelligence
Contact.intro_text: BrainCo is dedicated to developing brain-computer interface technology and products. Through years of accumulation in wearable brain-computer interface devices, AI algorithms, neuroscience, and interaction design, we provide users with innovative brain-computer interface+ solutions. By empowering existing industries with brain-computer interface technology, our business now covers health, rehabilitation, education, robotics, and other fields. We look forward to hearing from you.
Contact.address_hangzhou:
Zhejiang BrainCo Technology Co., Ltd.
Address: Room 201, Building 1, AI Town, Yuhang District, Hangzhou
Contact.address_shenzhen:
Shenzhen Xinliu Technology Co., Ltd.
Address: 2801/2802, 28th Floor, Building F, Tongfang Kexing Science Park, No. 11 Langshan Road, Nanshan District, Shenzhen
Contact.address_boston:
BrainCo Inc.
Address: 120 Beacon St #300, Somerville, MA 02143
Contact.area_rehabilitation_desc: BrainCo has conducted years of research in neurological, EMG, and EEG detection, and underlying algorithm research, achieving groundbreaking technical results. We have been deeply exploring and applying in fields such as disability rehabilitation, autism rehabilitation, and cognitive rehabilitation.
Contact.area_health_desc: BrainCo has conducted in-depth technical research and development in sleep monitoring, physiological signal analysis, and neurofeedback training, establishing a comprehensive health intervention system. We have achieved product commercialization and promotion in areas such as sleep disorders and mindfulness stress relief.
Contact.area_education_desc: BrainCo collaborates with experts from various fields to create rich course content including focus training and emotion management. We also assist universities and primary and secondary schools in building neuroscience and artificial intelligence training centers, promoting multidisciplinary development and deep integration of industry and education.
Contact.area_embodied_intelligence_desc: BrainCo has launched dexterous hand products suitable for embodied intelligence, demonstrating leading technical capabilities in human-machine collaboration and precision manufacturing, helping embodied intelligence expand application scenarios and empower various industries.
Contact.form_project_placeholder: Please describe your cooperation needs & intended project in detail
Contact.submit_error: Submission failed, please try again later

Recruit.meta_description: Join BrainCo to change the world together. We offer personalized training, competitive salaries, and an elite R&D environment
Recruit.jobs_meta_description: BrainCo is hiring talented professionals. Check out our job openings
Recruit.brain_tech_slogan: Brain-Computer Interface Technology, Unlocking Life's Infinite Possibilities
Recruit.great_product_title_1: No great product is born naturally
Recruit.great_product_title_2: Just as no great life is achieved effortlessly
Recruit.philosophy_paragraph: In this era of restless entrepreneurship, where 'technology monetization' is pursued above all else, and all AI companies are rushing to bring products to market, BrainCo has chosen humility and silence, settling down to focus on solid development.
Recruit.nine_years_title: Nine years of dedication, researching technology, and meticulously refining products
Recruit.journey_paragraph: We believe that only through focus can we achieve excellence, and only through focus can we do things well. From having just one full-time employee to now having a professional team of dozens of scientists, from fighting alone to now having hundreds of partner schools and institutions, from an unknown small startup to being recognized as one of the world's top ten brain-computer interface companies today, every step we've taken is marked with hardship and determination.
Recruit.elite_environment: Small but Excellent Elite R&D Environment
Recruit.intro_1: We pursue technological innovation, differentiated innovative products and business models. With rich functional and project lines, we encourage you to take a step into other areas of interest, providing comprehensive multi-dimensional work scope to improve your cognitive landscape.
Recruit.intro_2: Our mentor teams have accumulated successful experience in various fields. Domestic and international experts, scientists, and technical research partners - the company's valuable assets accompany you, helping you build your first network of resources and providing a more global perspective.
Recruit.intro_3: A warm office environment, spacious rest areas and fitness zones, rich employee activities, breakfast, late-night work meals, afternoon tea, and continuous snacks. Our caring organizational culture provides you with strong support - you just need to focus on creating.
Recruit.join_us_final: If you also have a passionate and burning heart, please join us to change the world together!

Mobius.meta_title: Revolimb Bionic Leg - Intelligent Lower Limb Prosthetic - BrainCo
Mobius.meta_description: Revolimb Intelligent Bionic Leg integrates brain-computer interface technology and AI algorithms for real-time gait adjustment and highly bionic experience. Supports multiple activity scenarios with intelligent safety and stability.
Mobius.intro_text: The intelligent bionic leg is a new generation of intelligent lower limb that integrates brain-computer interface technology and artificial intelligence algorithms. It can make real-time gait adjustments based on the wearer's environment and muscle conditions during walking, achieving a highly bionic experience.
Mobius.m2_desc: Revolimb M2's advanced sensor system collects data in real-time and can dynamically adapt according to current movement status, presenting walking patterns that better conform to physiological characteristics, making users' gait natural, beautiful, and light. The algorithm intelligently detects abnormal situations and can actively emergency stop in sudden scenarios, providing safer and more stable support. Through the Revolimb App and other methods, users can easily adjust and manage the prosthesis.
Mobius.m3_desc: Revolimb M3 further enhances the excellent functions of Revolimb M2. While maintaining natural and beautiful gait, the motion modes have increased from 2 to 5. Users can easily perform alternating stair climbing, bent-leg downhill walking, and other movements close to able-bodied people. Whether crossing the street or catching a bus, users can freely adjust their pace like able-bodied people, easily switching from slow walk to light jog. The algorithm intelligently detects abnormal situations and can actively emergency stop in sudden scenarios, providing safer and more stable support. Through the Revolimb App and other methods, users can easily adjust and manage the prosthesis.
Mobius.scenario_desc: This product processes neuromuscular signals through AI algorithms combined with built-in sensors to recognize user intent, adapting to the wearer's gait in different environments and dynamically adjusting knee joint damping state. Especially when going downhill or downstairs, users can confidently put their weight on the prosthetic side without losing support. Compared to traditional knee joint prosthetics, the intelligent bionic leg is more stable and safer.
Mobius.feature_sensor_title: Multi-Sensor Fusion Sampling Frequency up to
Mobius.feature_button_desc: Humanized button design for user convenience. Link with App to switch scenes with one button, and support one-button knee lock for easy wearing and acceptance.
Mobius.feature_sleep_desc: When the product is not in use for a long time, the Revolimb M3 Smart Bionic Leg will automatically enter sleep mode, which helps to extend usage time.
Mobius.feature_vibration_desc: When the product encounters scene switching, sleep wake-up, low battery, fault and other situations, the vibration reminder function of Revolimb M3 Smart Bionic Leg can enable users to perceive product changes timely and clearly.
Mobius.feature_hydraulic_desc: Durability and control capabilities have been greatly improved compared to the previous generation, making it more durable.
Mobius.feature_battery_desc: With 4 hours of charging and walking 5000 steps per day, Revolimb M3 can be used for more than 4 days (calculated based on 5000 steps per day per user)
Mobius.feature_sensors_desc: Integrates gyroscope, position sensor, myoelectric acquisition sensor (algorithm under development), etc. Multi-sensor fusion collects data in real time, with a maximum sampling frequency of up to 1000Hz. After algorithm processing, it is converted into instructions to control the hydraulic system of the product, enabling the Revolimb M3 Smart Bionic Leg to dynamically adapt in real time to the current movement conditions.
Mobius.feature_algorithm_desc: High accuracy in gait recognition, natural gait control, walking closer to bionic physiological gait, more relaxed and effortless.
Mobius.app_desc: The Revolimb App integrates both fitter and user login identities, making it convenient for fitters to adjust parameters and manage users, and for users to check product status and better use the bionic leg.
Mobius.comparison_support_value: Carbon fiber composite material load-bearing appearance integrated
Mobius.patent_title: Number of Patents in Intelligent Prosthetics Field

BrainRobotics.meta_title: Intelligent Bionic Hand - Brain-Computer Interface Technology - BrainCo
BrainRobotics.meta_description: BrainCo Intelligent Bionic Hand integrates brain-computer interface technology with AI algorithms, detecting neural and muscle signals to recognize movement intentions, achieving dexterous intelligence and mind-controlled movement.
BrainRobotics.intro_text: The BrainCo Intelligent Bionic Hand is a smart product that highly integrates brain-computer interface technology with artificial intelligence algorithms. This bionic hand can detect the wearer's neural and muscle electrical signals, recognize movement intentions, and convert them into actions, achieving dexterous intelligence and mind-controlled movement.
BrainRobotics.gesture_1_desc: Touch buttons and switches, represent number '8'
BrainRobotics.gesture_1_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid pressing fingers with force.
BrainRobotics.gesture_2_desc: For gripping medium-sized or disc-shaped objects such as phones, bottle caps, glue sticks, etc.
BrainRobotics.gesture_2_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid pressing fingers with force.
BrainRobotics.gesture_3_desc: For gripping elongated objects such as pens, pencils, brushes for writing
BrainRobotics.gesture_4_desc: For holding rod-shaped objects like cigarettes, can also indicate 'victory' or number '2'
BrainRobotics.gesture_4_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid gripping heavy objects.
BrainRobotics.gesture_5_desc: For holding bowls, plates, etc. Represents number '4'
BrainRobotics.gesture_6_desc: For gripping elongated objects such as pens, pencils, brushes for writing
BrainRobotics.gesture_7_desc: For holding rod-shaped objects like cigarettes
BrainRobotics.gesture_7_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid gripping heavy objects.
BrainRobotics.gesture_8_desc: Uses motor and torsion spring to flick out the index finger
BrainRobotics.gesture_8_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid frequent use of this gesture.
BrainRobotics.gesture_9_desc: For grasping large cylindrical or soft objects
BrainRobotics.gesture_9_tips: Prevent excessive contact variation with objects, palm does not fully contact object.
BrainRobotics.gesture_10_desc: For pinching small, lightweight objects, represents 'OK'
BrainRobotics.gesture_10_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid hooking heavy objects with a single finger.
BrainRobotics.gesture_11_desc: Uses motor and torsion spring to flick out the middle finger
BrainRobotics.gesture_11_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid frequent use of this gesture.
BrainRobotics.gesture_13_desc: For controlling a mouse. When selected, the bionic hand forms an envelope around the mouse.
BrainRobotics.gesture_14_desc: For picking up bowls or large-diameter cylindrical objects without palm contact.
BrainRobotics.gesture_14_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid lifting heavy objects.
BrainRobotics.gesture_15_desc: For hooking objects like pull tabs. Represents number '9'.
BrainRobotics.gesture_17_desc: For flat carrying objects, represents gesture number '5'
BrainRobotics.gesture_17_tips: To protect your bionic hand, avoid lifting heavy objects.
BrainRobotics.gesture_18_desc: Uses the side of index finger with thumb to complete pinching
BrainRobotics.param_1_desc: All 5 fingers can move independently or cooperatively
BrainRobotics.param_2_desc: Similar to adult male hand weight
BrainRobotics.param_3_desc: Can pinch tissue paper, business cards, and other thin items
BrainRobotics.param_4_desc: Real-time neural and muscle signal sensing

Revo1.meta_title: Bionic Dexterous Hand Revo 1 - Breaking Limits, Empowering Industrial Future - BrainCo
Revo1.meta_description: Bionic Dexterous Hand Revo 1 is a high-performance industrial-grade dexterous hand with strong grip up to 30kg load capacity, high-speed precise control, multimodal tactile sensing, and flexible integration with customization support.
Revo1.subtitle: Breaking Limits, Empowering the Future
Revo1.industry_1_desc: Single hand grip force up to 6kg, load capacity up to 30kg
Revo1.industry_2_desc: Providing 0.1mm precision, 0.8s opening/closing speed, ≤10ms control cycle, real-time control frequency ≥100Hz
Revo1.industry_3_desc: Fingertip modules equipped with multi-dimensional tactile sensors that detect pressure, friction, force direction, proximity distance, and surface material. Can sense forces as small as 1g with maximum precision of 0.01N
Revo1.industry_4_desc: Supports 485 and CAN interfaces, compatible with Modbus-RTU protocol for easy customization. Provides Python and C language SDK and ROS simulation support
Revo1.ability_2_desc: Achieves fast and precise performance in complex operations
Revo1.ability_3_desc: Equipped with multi-dimensional tactile sensing to detect pressure, friction, force direction, proximity distance, and surface material
Revo1.ability_4_desc: Flexibly adapts to various industrial and research application scenarios
Revo1.experience_desc: This dexterous hand features highly bionic design that mimics natural hand movements. It has won multiple international design awards, including the Red Dot Best Design Award and the China Design Intelligence Award. The design not only meets ergonomic principles but also adapts to diverse hand movement needs with smooth and natural operation
Revo1.quality_title: Customer Trust is the Testimony of Quality
Revo1.partner_cta_text: Interested in collaboration or want to see a demo of our products?
Revo1.partner_email_note: If you cannot reach us, please send an email to zhige.zhang@brainco.cn
Revo1.spec_main_material_value: Aviation Aluminum Alloy & Food Grade Plastic
Revo1.spec_smart_control_value: Fine Operation Control, Anti-Stall Control, Anti-Drop & Anti-Shake Control
Revo1.spec_multi_tactile_sensor_value: Normal Force, Friction, Force Direction, Proximity Distance

Revo2.meta_title: Bionic Dexterous Hand Revo 2 - Lightweight and Compact Industrial Dexterous Hand - BrainCo
Revo2.meta_description: Bionic Dexterous Hand Revo 2 is a lightweight, compact industrial-grade dexterous hand weighing only 383g, with a height of 160mm, 11 DOF, customizable colors, available in Basic, Pro, and Tactile versions.
Revo2.subtitle: A Lightweight and Compact Bionic Dexterous Hand
Revo2.feature_compact_desc: Only 160mm in height, almost the same as iPhone 16 Pro Max, truly achieving a compact and agile bionic design
Revo2.feature_light_desc: Light as a bottle of water, greatly reducing robot payload pressure
Revo2.feature_bionic_desc: 11 DOF (6 active joints), perfectly simulating human hand movements for precise and flexible operation control
Revo2.feature_custom_desc: Supports color customization to meet aesthetic needs of different application scenarios
Revo2.specs_desc: Using advanced bionic technology and precision manufacturing processes, every parameter reflects our pursuit of ultimate performance.
Revo2.spec_protection: Features current protection, stall protection, high temperature protection, collision protection
Revo2.spec_sdk: SDK supports Python/C, supports Linux/Windows/ROS systems
Revo2.summary_desc: Leading the future of bionic robot technology, providing the most advanced dexterous hand solutions for intelligent manufacturing and service robots.
Revo2.email_note: If you cannot reach us, please send an email to zhige.zhang@brainco.cn

BrainAI.meta_description: BrainAI Neuroscience & AI Course is a PBL-based program emphasizing student experience and achievement, covering school programs, leadership camps, and NeuroMaster competitions for schools, institutions, camps, and competitions.
BrainAI.hero_description: BrainAI Neuroscience & AI Course is a PBL-based curriculum focusing on student experience and achievement, applicable to schools, institutions, summer/winter camps, and competitions. Students gain hands-on understanding of neuroscience, artificial intelligence, programming, electronic circuits, and mechanical structures while learning to solve real-world problems and create real-world impact.
BrainAI.video_subtitle: Ignite Learning Excellence with Great Courses
BrainAI.section1_desc1: · Multi-scenario applications for grades 3-8: regular classes, interest classes, elective courses
BrainAI.section1_desc2: · Flexible curriculum solutions with multiple combinations
BrainAI.section1_desc3: · Comprehensive teacher training for effortless teaching
BrainAI.section1_desc4: · Create innovative neuroscience & AI course solutions
BrainAI.section2_desc1: · Originated from Harvard Innovation Lab, star course at Yale Summer School
BrainAI.section2_desc4: · Integrated with NM mini competitions for enriched holiday learning
BrainAI.section3_desc1: · NeuroMaster AI Challenge provides competition courses and equipment for distributors/educational institutions/schools
BrainAI.section3_desc2: · National whitelist competition support: 'Future City' and 'Mars Rescue' projects featured in World Robot Contest (WRC)
BrainAI.course_intro_5: Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
BrainAI.leader_description: Originating from Harvard University Innovation Lab, BrainAI Tech Leadership Camp provides engaging cutting-edge technology education for global youth. Yale University Summer School has used BrainCo's intelligent technology hardware as required camp content for 3 consecutive years. Students certified and recommended by BrainAI Tech Leadership Camp have entered top universities worldwide. In 2020, BrainAI Tech Leadership Camp came to China, bringing mature operational experience, rich student experiences, and profitable, replicable solutions to guide Chinese youth aged 6-14 through the essential skills of the new era—artificial intelligence and brain-computer interfaces.
BrainAI.challenge1_desc2: · Students systematically learn neuroscience & AI fundamentals, master graphical programming, understand mechanical hand structure design in human engineering, robot car construction, and proficient use of brain-control software
BrainAI.challenge2_desc1: · Competitive + mission-based contest emphasizing team strategy and cooperation
BrainAI.challenge2_desc2: · Neuroscience & AI + AI programming, novel and engaging competition themes
BrainAI.challenge2_desc3: · Rich curriculum content allowing students to learn neuroscience & AI fundamentals, master mainstream graphical programming languages, understand robot vision processing, and mechanical structure construction

EASleep.meta_description: Easleep Smart Sleep Device, an intelligent sleep solution based on neuroscience technology, provides precise EEG feedback, CES physical sleep aid, B-CBTi sleep repair and other functions to help you sleep well.
EASleep.swiper_desc_1: Precise EEG feedback, clear sleep state monitoring
EASleep.swiper_desc_2: Gentle on skin, effortless sleep without pressure
EASleep.research_title: BrainCo R&D team collaborated with top-tier hospitals
EASleep.research_desc: Clinical research project on 'Multifunctional Wearable Device Intervention for Insomnia' proves
EASleep.research_improvement: Significant improvement in sleep onset speed
EASleep.solution_title: Easleep Intelligent Closed-Loop Sleep Improvement Solution
EASleep.solution_1_desc3: Scientific determination of brain neural state
EASleep.solution_5_desc3: Sleep improvement effects at a glance
EASleep.patent_title: Technology speaks for itself, BrainCo is trustworthy
EASleep.patent_desc: Continuous innovation for quality, technology benefits life
EASleep.ces_desc: CES physical sleep aid acts on cerebral cortex and brainstem structures, generating low-intensity, micro weak pulse currents that effectively stimulate the brain to secrete calming endorphins, reduce cortisol levels, and alleviate anxiety and stress.
EASleep.binaural_title: Binaural Beats & Multiple Sound Wave Sleep Aid
EASleep.binaural_desc1: Built-in binaural beats and various sleep-inducing sound waves (white noise, pink noise),
EASleep.binaural_desc2: Effectively reduces user's heart rate, promotes neurotransmitter secretion, and quickly induces sleepiness.
EASleep.manager_desc1: Easleep objectively records your brainwave data, precisely analyzes brain state,
EASleep.manager_desc2: Generates multi-dimensional sleep analysis reports, and provides B-CBTi* sleep repair solutions based on neuroscience.
EASleep.manager_feature_1: Real-time EEG feedback for multi-dimensional sleep reports
EASleep.manager_feature_2: Precise sleep stage determination and sleep structure optimization
EASleep.manager_feature_3: B-CBTi sleep repair solution combining neuroscience + cognitive behavioral intervention
EASleep.manager_note: *Note: B-CBTi, or Brain Science Sleep Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, is a sleep improvement solution enhanced by brain science sleep precision intervention based on digital CBTi treatment technology. Traditional CBTi often relies on professional guidance in hospital settings, while digital CBTi solutions are more convenient and easy to learn, with effects comparable to offline treatment.

FocusXin.meta_title: FocusXin - BCI Attention Training System for Children - BrainCo
FocusXin.meta_description: FocusXin is a brain-computer interface neurofeedback training intervention for children with attention problems, using scientifically validated neurofeedback training methods to help children improve attention.
FocusXin.hero_description: Brain-Computer Interface Neurofeedback Training Intervention for Children's Attention Problems
FocusXin.problem_title: Does Your Child Have Similar Behaviors?
FocusXin.problem_conclusion: It May Be An Attention Problem!
FocusXin.principle_title: Neurofeedback Training is a Scientifically Validated Method for Improving Attention
FocusXin.principle_footnote: Neurofeedback training for ADHD is recommended by the American Academy of Pediatrics Guidelines (2012)
FocusXin.literature_2: [2]Multiple research materials and clinical trials have proven that the neurofeedback training intervention method used by the product is suitable for training children with executive function and attention problems. Some research materials: Yasaman Bagherzadeh, Daniel Baldauf, Dimitrios Pantazis, Robert Desim-one. (2019). Alpha Synchrony and the Neurofeedback Control of SpatialAttention. Neuron. Steiner, N. J., Frenette, E. C., Rene, K. M., Brennan, R. T., & Perrin, E. C. (2014). In-school neurofeedback training for adhd: sustained improvements from a randomized control trial. Pediatrics, 133(3), 483-492. Nataliya Kosmyna, Pattie Maes. (2019). AttentivU: An EEG-Based Closed-Loop Biofeedback System for Real-Time Monitoring and Improvement of Engagement for Personalized Learning. Sensors 2019, 19. 5200.
FocusXin.literature_3: [3]Single-electrode signal accuracy can reach over 95% of professional EEG detection equipment (g.tec) (China Inspection Group Southern Testing Co., Ltd. inspection report, Report No. SET2020-14408)
FocusXin.training_title: Three Training Modules Working Together to Help Children Grow Comprehensively
FocusXin.training_module_1_desc: Relieve anxiety and stress, help children achieve physical and mental balance during training
FocusXin.training_module_2_desc: Real-time audio feedback of attention state, help children find the "feeling" of focus
FocusXin.training_module_3_desc: Multi-dimensional scientific training content design to comprehensively improve children's attention
FocusXin.assessment_description: After assessment, the system personalizes training content recommendations for children, making training more targeted and efficient!
FocusXin.game_description: Adventure scenes from six ancient civilizations, combined with 50+ gamified training content, learn to focus through "play"!
FocusXin.tracking_description: Through daily reports and stage reports, understand children's growth and changes, and visually see training effects.
FocusXin.patent_title: Research Innovation, Strength Proven with Over 40 Invention Patents

StarKids.meta_title: StarKids Social Communication Training System - BrainCo
StarKids.meta_description: StarKids is an intelligent rehabilitation and education training system based on brain-computer interface technology, focusing on social and language disorders in children with autism spectrum and developmental delays.
StarKids.hero_description: Using neuroscience to promote children's development
StarKids.system_title: Intelligent Rehabilitation & Education Training System Based on BCI Technology
StarKids.feature_1_desc: Suitable for children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) and various developmental delays
StarKids.feature_2_desc: Integrated assessment and training to improve cognitive thinking, enhance language, and promote social development

StarKids.track_data_desc_2: Data reports provide scientific assistance for therapists in developing IEP intervention plans
StarKids.intervene_research_tag: #Clinical research from China Rehabilitation Research Center (Tertiary Hospital) shows
StarKids.intervene_effectiveness: StarKids brain training has an effectiveness rate of
StarKids.intervene_paper: Research paper `Wearable EEG Neurofeedback based-on Machine Learning Algorithms for Children with Autism: a Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study` published in the journal Current Medical Science
StarKids.intervene_disclaimer: * Randomized placebo-controlled studies show that 60 sessions (3-4 months) of StarKids neurofeedback training significantly improved social and verbal expression compared to the control group, with an effectiveness rate of 88.2% for verbal expression.
StarKids.intervene_hospital_desc: The China Rehabilitation Research Center and Beijing Bo'ai Hospital is a tertiary hospital specializing in rehabilitation, a clinical research base directly under the National Health Commission, and has won awards including the National Rehabilitation Medicine Scientific Achievement Award and the National Physician Skills Competition Gold Medal. It has undertaken research projects from the WHO, UNICEF, Ministry of Science and Technology, and Ministry of Health.
StarKids.intervene_study_details: Data from the National Autism Rehabilitation Research Center: 28 autistic children aged 3-7 with matched autism severity (measured by CARS scores), receiving the same behavioral training courses, completed clinical testing of 60 neurofeedback training sessions (5 times per week, 30 minutes each). Actual results may vary by individual.

Technology.page_intro: BrainCo is driven by cutting-edge technology and research-oriented innovation, backed by a leading team of scientists, over 70% of whom are outstanding alumni from world-class institutions such as Harvard, MIT, Tsinghua, and Peking University. The company currently holds over 200 core invention patents in the brain-computer interface field, positioning it at the forefront globally. BrainCo has successfully overcome the challenge of large-scale, precise EEG signal acquisition. Its independently developed solid gel electrodes have achieved mass production, significantly enhancing signal accuracy and stability. Building on this foundation, the company has established a comprehensive technology chain covering EEG and neural signal acquisition, analysis, and real-time feedback, achieving breakthroughs from laboratory research to industrial applications, with widespread use in rehabilitation, healthcare, human-computer interaction, and embodied intelligence.
